definition: coordinate in such a way that all parts work together effectively, the act of interlocking or meshing
details:
verb
- coordinate in such a way that all parts work together effectively
= synonyms: mesh
- become engaged or intermeshed with one another
= synonyms: lock
- hold in a locking position
= synonyms: lock, interlace
noun
- the act of interlocking or meshing
= example: the act of interlocking or meshing
= synonyms: mesh
- a device that prevents an automotive engine from starting
= example: a device that prevents an automotive engine from starting
= synonyms: ignition interlock
